Articles.Content:
I was wondering is there any way to mark KSC on the orbital map other than just landing a rocket next to it?

Or marking any spot? It would be very helpful for planning landing areas to be able to mark a dot or something on the orbital map.
Currently this is only possible by leaving an object at the site, you can rename the object in the persistence file and a manned pod will show up better than a piece of debris

one part that i found (unintentionally) useful for marking KSC in the map view is the "TT18-A Launch Stability Enhancer", because it always gets left behind on the launchpad and is (as far as i know) impossible to move accidentally
